data.markdown:
# Example Article Two: Understanding Local Development

Another mock article to test the read/unread feature.

## Why Local Development Matters

Local development allows you to iterate quickly without deploying to production. This is especially important when testing new features like the read/unread functionality.

## Setting Up Your Environment

1. Clone the repository
2. Install dependencies with `npm install`
3. Run `npx wrangler dev --env local --persist`
4. Seed mock data

## Testing the Read/Unread Feature

The new read/unread feature includes:

- **Tabs**: Switch between unread and read bookmarks
- **Toggle**: Click the checkbox to mark as read/unread
- **Counts**: See how many items are in each category

## Troubleshooting

> If you encounter issues, check the browser console for errors.

## Summary

Local development with mock data is the best way to test new features before deployment.
